Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis IFO3134 (BC50=0.09 µM), Kocuria varians MAFF118076 (BC50=0.008 µM), Staphylococcus aureus ATCC6538P (BC50=0.005 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Agrobacterium tumefaciens MAFF1001 (BC50=0.05 µM), Bdellovibrio bacteriovorus MAFF106101 (BC50=0.06 µM), Klebsiella pneumoniae MAFF519002 (BC50=0.9 µM), Escherichia coli JM109 (BC50>15 µM).Fungi:Candida krusei MAFF114085 (BC50=0.3 µM), Debaryomyces hansenii MAFF113836 (BC50>15 µM), Kluyveromyces thermotolerans MAFF113848 (BC50=0.3 µM), Paeonia anomala MAFF113717 (BC50=0.08 µM), Saccharomyces cerevisiae MAFF113011 (BC50=0.6 µM), Torulaspora delbrueckiiMAFF113811 (BC50>15 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: abf-1 and abf-2, ASABF-type antimicrobial peptide genes in Caenorhabditis elegans.
Literature.Author: Kato Y, Aizawa T, Hoshino H, Kawano K, Nitta K, Zhang H.
